Method Detail

retry

public EventState retry(EventReference ref)
Retries the given event.

Parameters:
ref - the EventReference encapsulating information on the event to retry
Returns:
the suggested new state for the event

stateChanged

public void stateChanged(EventReference ref,
                         EventState newState)
This method is invoked when a state change occurs on an event. Generally, the Action associated to the state change, if any, is executed.

Parameters:
ref -
newState -

associateAction

public void associateAction(EventState originState,
                            EventState destinationState,
                            Action action)
Associate an action to a change of state for an event.

Parameters:
originState - the state where the event was in
destinationState - the state where the event has got
action - the action to execute
